Uses of Class
com.braintobytes.serialspeed.cryptomania.Cryptography

  • Packages that use Cryptography 
    Package Description
    com.braintobytes.serialspeed.cryptomania  

    • Uses of Cryptography in com.braintobytes.serialspeed.cryptomania

      Methods in com.braintobytes.serialspeed.cryptomania that return Cryptography 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Cryptography CryptoUtil.doDecryptObject(byte[] password, String path, byte[] salt)

      Decrypt a serializable object in 128 bit AES using a PBKDF2 with SHA1 key, uses standard 128 bit length key size and deserialize an object through path

      Object must implement Serializable to work

      We suggest to use a generated serial version ID

      Get info on Advanced Encryption Standard (AES): https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Advanced_Encryption_Standard

      Get info on serialization: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Serialization
